snippet: Dozens of small and predominantly Latino communities in the Central Valley region of California continue to be plagued by contaminated drinking water.
abstract: Dozens of small and predominantly Latino communities in California's Central Valley region continue to be plagued by contaminated drinking water, result of half-decade of poorly-regulated agricultural waste; many towns in region have long been excluded from land use development decisions that have exacerbated problem.
lead_paragraph: Dozens of small and predominantly Latino communities in the Central Valley region of California continue to be plagued by contaminated drinking water.

headline.seo: Filthy Water in California Farmworker Communities
headline.main: The Problem Is Clear: The Water Is Filthy
headline.print_headline: The Problem Is Clear: The Water Is Filthy
